description: Simulated NISAR products are specialized UAVSAR PolSAR products. They include files described in the UAVSAR PolSAR Data Format but with different number of MLC looks and GRD grid; as well as additional NISAR RSLC HDF5 files, radiometric terrain correction layer, and flat earth incidence angle files.

links.title: Simulated NISAR Products documentation
links.description: Simulated NISAR products are generated from UAVSAR data to emulate NISAR data characteristics in order to help users test their algorithms and get a sense of the quality of future NISAR products. Click on the links below to go to the desired section.
